Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Post.title: Git
Post._content:
* content
{:toc}


# Git

- ,

  ```
  git rm -r /path/to/filename
  git commit -m "msg"
  git push
  ```

- ,

  ```
  git rm /path/to/filename
  git commit -m "msg"
  git push
  ```


- 

  ```
  git branch -a
  ```
  	
- 

  ```
  git branch
  ```

- 

  ```
  git checkout [branchname]
  ```
  
- 

  ```
  git log --oneline --decorate
  ```
  
- masterABmasterAmasterB
  
  ```
  git branch -m master A
  masterA
  git branch -m B master
  Bmaster
  git push -f origin master
  master
  ```

# Windows.md

## 

windows10
Typora

## 

![Markdown](/myimage/win-right-click-md/1546050455.jpg "")

## 

### 1. 
1. `CMD+R`
2. `regedit`

### 2. 
1. `>HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT``Typora`
![typora](/myimage/win-right-click-md/20181229103503.png)
2. `Typora.exe`
![md](C:/myimage/win-right-click-md/20181229103752.png)
markdownpad
3. `.reg`
4. 
```
Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00
[HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\.md]
@="Typora.exe"
[HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\.md\ShellNew]
"NullFile"=""
[HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\Typora.exe]
@="Markdown"
```

`@="Typora.exe"` .md
`@="Markdown"` `Markdown.md``MarkDown`
5. ,,:
![](/myimage/win-right-click-md/20181229105408.png)
`.reg`,`(*.txt)`,`Unicode`,!!!!!
6. ,,,,,.

### 3. ()
1. `Typora`,`Typora.exe``DefaultIcon`,
2. Markdown

  ![Markdown](/myimage/win-right-click-md/20181229105300.png)


`stepneverstop@qq.com`
